name: @roarexclamation/paystack-ts-sdk
description: TypeScript SDK for Paystack API - A modern, type-safe client for payment processing in Africa

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate && npm run compile
scripts.generate: openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PaystackOSS/openapi/main/main/paystack.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o ./generated --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=npmName=@roarexclamation/paystack-ts-sdk,supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=false,modelPropertyNaming=camelCase,paramNaming=camelCase,typescriptThreePlus=true && node scripts/fix-generated-code.js && node scripts/generate-dynamic-index.js
scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:types
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test && npm run lint
scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run compile:types && tsc --watch

author: roarexclamation
